alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; East Carroll; Franklin; Madison; Morehouse; Richland; Tensas; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 27 at 2:17PM CDT until August 28 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHEAST LOUISIANA, SOUTHEAST ARKANSAS, NORTHWEST, WESTERN, SOUTH CENTRAL AND SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Monday morning through Monday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Richland, Franklin LA, Catahoula, Tensas Concordia, Morehouse, West Carroll, East Carroll and Madison LA Parishes in Louisiana. Ashley and Chicot in Arkansas. Claiborne, Copiah, Jefferson, Adams, Franklin MS, Lincoln, Lawrence, Jefferson Davis, Marion, Lamar, Forrest, Issaquena, Sharkey Warren, Bolivar, Sunflower, Leflore, Washington, Humphreys, Covington and Jones in Mississippi. * WIND...Variable in direction up to 10 mph with gusts up to 15 to 20 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 25 to 30 percent, especially in southeastern Mississippi. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will create explosive fire growth potential. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Catahoula; Concordia; East Carroll; Franklin; Madison; Morehouse; Richland; Tensas; West Carroll
